Key Match Events: Carlos Correa drove in all four Minnesota runs, including a clutch, go-ahead, two-run single in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Bailey Ober struck out a career-high 12 batters in seven innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The loss trimmed the Twins’ lead over the Tigers for the AL’s final Wild Card berth down to a half-game
Others: The Twins’ depleted bullpen ran out of gas, with Ronny Henriquez and Michael Tonkin allowing three runs in a 5-4, walk-off loss to the Guardians
